meta.description: Traveling Salesperson Problem: Minimize travel cost to visit each city exactly once and return to the starting city.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Set of cities to be visited by the salesperson.

params.name: travel_cost
params.description: Cost of travel between each pair of cities.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the salesperson travels from city i to city j.

vars.name: u
vars.description: Helper variable for subtour elimination, representing the order of visiting cities.

objective.name: min_total_travel_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total travel cost for visiting all cities and returning to the start.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure city 1 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['2'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure city 2 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['3'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure city 3 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['4'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure city 4 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['5'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '5')
constraints.description: Ensure city 5 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['1'] for i in CITIES if i != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 1 exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['2'] for i in CITIES if i != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 2 exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['3'] for i in CITIES if i != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 3 exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['4'] for i in CITIES if i != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 4 exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['5'] for i in CITIES if i != '5')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 5 exactly once.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 1 and city 2.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 1 and city 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 1 and city 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 1 and city 5.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 1.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 5.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 1.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 2.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 5.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 4 and city 1.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 4 and city 2.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 4 and city 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 4 and city 5.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_5_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 5 and city 1.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_5_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 5 and city 2.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_5_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 5 and city 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_5_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 5 and city 4.
